author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Chilton DHR grants 130 children’s wishes this Christmas - The Clanton Advertiser
text:
Summary by Ground News Chilton County Department of Human Resources' annual Christmas fundraiser benefited foster children in the county. DHR granted all wishes on the children's lists with the help of outpouring support from individuals, businesses and groups in the Chilton County community. Those who contributed chose to either take the wish list for a child and get the gifts themselves, or gave a monetary donation and DHR did the shopping. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
focus.de 609,500 children sent wishes to Christmas post offices Deutsche Post's seven Christmas post offices received 609,500 children's letters with Christmas wishes to the Christ Child, Santa Claus and St. Nicholas this year.
